trans-unit.source: Provides an object list adapter for the mobile XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 为移动 XHTML 适配器集提供的对象列表适配器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The XhtmlObjectListAdapter class can be used by mobile control developers to display an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control on new devices or for new markup standards.
trans-unit.target: XhtmlObjectListAdapter 类可以使用由移动控件开发人员，以显示<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制在新设备上或针对新的标记标准。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Control and Adapter Interaction](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c330dabc-7e28-40bc-b777-101a5c6fa982).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[控件和适配器交互](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c330dabc-7e28-40bc-b777-101a5c6fa982)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate whether the user should be returned to the list view.
trans-unit.target: 字符串常量，回发事件自变量中用于指示用户是否应返回到列表视图。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The BackToList field, which is the value "__back", is used by mobile control developers.
trans-unit.target: BackToList 字段中，"__back"是值，移动控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回关联控件的强类型化的引用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by a control to create a templated user interface (UI) if device templates are defined.
trans-unit.target: 调用由控件创建模板化用户界面 (UI)，如果定义了设备模板。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.CreateTemplatedUI%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the corresponding control adapter, which in turn can either call back the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemsList%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemDetails%2A> method for the control, or create its own device-specific templated UI.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.CreateTemplatedUI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>反过来可以调用返回的相应控件适配器的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemsList%2A>方法或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemDetails%2A>方法对于控件，或创建自己的特定于设备的模板化用户界面。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemDetails%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemsList%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.CreateTemplatedUI%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bind the templated UI to the underlying <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将模板化用户界面绑定到基础<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果处理过此事件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific.
trans-unit.target: 在接收一个回发事件通知，以检查事件是否是特定于适配器的时，将由控件调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If the control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> method and receives a postback event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method of the control adapter is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>方法，并接收回发事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>调用控件适配器的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A> method of the control adapter.
trans-unit.target: 如果向控件发送的事件可以根据目标设备而有所不同，必须调用此方法的控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>控件适配器的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示设备适配器是否处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: It returns `false` by default.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回`false`默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event was handled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件进行处理;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: the postback data is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 回发数据无效。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> control contains any commands.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>控件包含任何命令。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> has one or more commands; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>包含一个或多个命令; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> control contains a default command.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>控件包含默认命令。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> contains a default command; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>包含默认命令; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a list item can display all fields of an item.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示列表项可以显示项的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The value of the HasItemDetails method indicates that the item needs a details view in order for the user to see all the data.
trans-unit.target: HasItemDetails 方法的值指示项需要详细信息视图中为了使该用户以查看所有数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all fields of a list item can be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以显示的列表项的所有字段;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> control contains a default command and no other commands.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>控件包含默认命令和任何其他命令。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> has a default command and no other commands; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>具有默认命令和任何其他命令; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called prior to rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: 在呈现的控件之前调用。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.target: 一个对象 (由定义<xref:System.EventArgs>) 包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Renders the control on the page using the provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的页上呈现控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>用于呈现服务器控件内容在客户端的浏览器上。

trans-unit.source: Renders the details of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 呈现指定项的详细的信息。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: The RenderItemDetails method is called during rendering for the details view of the specific item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中的特定项的详细信息视图的呈现过程中调用 RenderItemDetails 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the list of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现中项的列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: The RenderItemsList method is called during rendering to render each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中的每个项在呈现过程中调用 RenderItemsList 方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate whether the list should jump to the first item beyond the currently visible items.
trans-unit.target: 回发事件自变量中用于指示列表是否应跳转到超出当前可见的项的第一项的字符串常数。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: The ShowMore field, which is the value "__more", is used by mobile control developers.
trans-unit.target: ShowMore 字段中，"__more"是值，移动控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate that the browser should jump to a specific item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 字符串常量，用于回发事件自变量表示浏览器应跳转到列表中特定项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The ShowMoreFormat field, which is an internal field and has the value "__more*n*", where `n` is a number, is created during rendering.
trans-unit.target: ShowMoreFormat 字段，它是一个内部字段且具有值"__more*n*"，其中`n`是一个数字，则在呈现期间创建。

trans-unit.source: This field is used like the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore> field, except that it specifies the index of the item to display in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此字段用作<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore>字段，只不过它指定要在详细信息视图中显示的项的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore>

trans-unit.source: The ShowMoreFormat field is used by mobile control developers.
trans-unit.target: 移动控件开发人员使用 ShowMoreFormat 字段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
